channel.title: Letters to my Kids on Ian Teda
channel.description: Recent content in Letters to my Kids on Ian Teda

item.title: Life Is Hard, And That Is Good!
item.description: A letter to my kids, Real difficulties can be overcome; it is only the imaginary ones that are unconquerable. Theodore N. Vail Life is not all sun shine, unicorns and rainbows. Life is hard, it is meant to be hard and that is good!

item.title: Know Yourself, Be Yourself, Love Yourself
